response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet and exceed your expectations, offering unparalleled value and quality. Given its significance and the benefits it promises to bring to your endeavors, we believe its worth extends beyond $1,000,000. Considering its true worth to you, we are offering this remarkable product at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This exclusive opportunity allows us to share in the excitement of bringing such a valuable asset into your possession while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. We look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your business or personal projects. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
